titleStmt.title: A treasure of knowledge: springing from the fountaine of godlinesse, which is the word of God. A little catechisme, wherin is handled the doctrine of the knowledge of God in Iesus Christ. : Also a briefe and pithie exposition of the Ten Commandements of almightie God ... / plainely expounded and delclared in questions and answers, by the late faithfull minister and seruant of Iesus Christ, William Dyke..
titleStmt.author: Dyke, William

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Field for Robert Mylbourne, and are to be sold at the great South doore of Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.
